items.sentence: Tom sat under the tree and watched the children play.
Tom read the letter first and then handed it to Mary.
Tom quickly ate a sandwich and then got back to work.
Tom paid me three hundred dollars to do that for him.
Tom opened the door wearing his pajamas and slippers.
Tom and Mary didn't leave when they were supposed to.
This tastes a lot better than what Tom usually cooks.
The last time I saw Tom, he was wearing a cowboy hat.
Neither Tom nor Mary has very much money in the bank.
Neither Tom nor Mary has to be in Boston next Monday.
